articles.author: Dan Milmo
articles.title: Elon Musk pays for Stephen King and LeBron James to keep Twitter blue ticks - The Guardian
articles.description: Writer and basketball star are among famous names to retain ticks despite not signing up to Twitter Blue
articles.content: Elon Musk has admitted he is paying for some prominent Twitter accounts to retain their blue ticks, as the social media platform launched a cull that stripped verified status from many famous names i… [+3505 chars]
